title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height remains the same even after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: After changing the label content, its height should be adjusted according to the font size.
SR: 1. Open the UI. 2. Modify the font size of the label. 3. Verify that the label height does not change. 4. Change the label content. 5. Observe if the height is adjusted based on the font size.
